title: Truesight
excerpt: The ultimate form of vision, piercing through illusions and darkness.
markdown:
# Truesight

A creature with Truesight can, out to a specific range, see in normal and magical [[darkness|Darkness]], see [[invisible_condition|Invisible]] creatures and objects, automatically detect visual illusions and succeed on saving throws against them, and perceive the original form of a shapechanger or a creature that is transformed by magic.

Furthermore, the creature can see into the Ethereal Plane within the same range.
